name: veora Repo
subtitle: Contains tweaked apps, free streaming, cracked apps, and more.
description: This source is an automatically kept up-to-date source, powered by GitHub Actions, the Python altparse library.

apps.name: Streamer
apps.subtitle: App for Streaming Movies and TV shows
apps.localizedDescription:
App for Streaming Movies and TV shows on iOS and tvOS.

- Stream all TV shows and Movies from multiple websites without any annoying ads
- Supports Chromecast to stream to FireTV and Chromecasts
- Supports multi-language subtitles for iOS and tvOS
- Favorite functionality to quickly access your favorite shows and movies

versions.localizedDescription: # V 1.2.31 Release - You can now enjoy the theme music of your favorite Movie/TV show when you open its details page. To enable this feature, go to Advanced Settings and turn on the option. 🎶 - We have added a new section for streamer player in Advanced settings. Here you can customize your streaming preferences and quality. - We have fixed a bug that caused the app to crash when accessing Universal resolver settings. We have also improved the layout of this screen for a better user experience. - We are excited to announce the first version of our Mac app. 💻 ![simulator_screenshot_1B6F10FB-D2C0-4166-A2DF-B7F0A2B1F366](https://github.com/StreamerApp/Streamer/assets/96978272/d80f74d9-0ca3-4cd4-bf88-ec170780689f)

# v1.2.17 Release

- Fix Flixtor and 123Movies providers
- Restore compatibility with iOS 14 devices
- Introduce a new user interface for server selection in anticipation of Real-Debrid integration
- Display available storage space on the device on the download page

Don’t like ads? Consider donating to Streamer through https://buymeacoffee.com/streamerapp. Upon donation, we will email you a code to disable ads in the app. 🎉

- fixes Akwam, Cima4now, StreamingCommunity, KinoKiste, Zoro.to 
 - fixes search for Flixtor, Fmovies.to, sflix.pro

apps.name: uYouEnhanced
apps.subtitle: The best tweak for the YouTube app just got even better
apps.localizedDescription:
uYou is the best tweak for the YouTube app.
 
 uYouEnhanced is a modified version of uYouPlus & uYou with even more features.
 
 Additional features:
 • Skip sponsorships in videos (iSponsorBlock)
 • Even more PiP options (YouPiP)
 • Unlock 1440p and 2160p resolutions (YTUHD)
 • Disable overlay at the end of videos (YTNoHoverCards)
 • Remove YouTube Premium upsell alerts (NoYTPremium)
 • Enable to Dim the YouTube UI (LowContrastMode)
 • Enable the miniplayer for all videos (YTMiniplayerEnabler)
 • Prevent the notch/Dynamic Island from cutting into 2:1 videos (DontEatMyContent)
 • Configure A/B settings in the YouTube app (YTABConfig)
 • And more
 
 More information: 
 https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/ 
 
 Requires iOS 14.0 or later.
 
 Contributors: MiRO92, qnblackcat, PoomSmart, level3tjg, BandarHelal, galactic, julioverne, HASHBANG, Lyvendia, Foxster, ichitaso, Ahmed Bafkir, CokePokes, Tommy Teo, theos, and many others.

versions.localizedDescription:
• Updated YouTube to 18.49.3
 • uYou is using 3.0.1
 •Full changelog: 
 https://github.com/arichorn/uYouEnhanced/releases/tag/v18.49.3-3.0.1

uYou is the best tweak for the YouTube app.
 
 uYouPlus is a modified version of uYou with even more features.
 
 Additional features:
 • Skip sponsorships in videos (iSponsorBlock)
 • Even more PiP options (YouPiP)
 • Unlock 1440p and 2160p resolutions (YTUHD)
 • Disable overlay at the end of videos (YTNoHoverCards)
 • Remove YouTube Premium upsell alerts (NoYTPremium)
 • Enable to Dim the YouTube UI (LowContrastMode)
 • Enable the miniplayer for all videos (YTMiniplayerEnabler)
 • Prevent the notch/Dynamic Island from cutting into 2:1 videos (DontEatMyContent)
 • Configure A/B settings in the YouTube app (YTABConfig)
 • And more
 
 More information: 
 https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/ 
 
 Requires iOS 14.0 or later.
 
 Contributors: MiRO92, qnblackcat, PoomSmart, level3tjg, BandarHelal, galactic, julioverne, HASHBANG, Lyvendia, Foxster, ichitaso, Ahmed Bafkir, CokePokes, Tommy Teo, theos, and many others.

privacy.name: AppleMusic
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.

privacy.name: Contacts
privacy.usageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.

apps.name: TrollSpeed
apps.subtitle: Shows upload & download speed below the status bar.
apps.localizedDescription: Shows upload & download speed below the status bar./n Tested and expected to work on all iOS versions supported by opa334’s TrollStore./n You need to enable “Developer Mode” on iOS 16 or above to use TrollSpeed or Misaka.

versions.localizedDescription: (Experimental) Adjust vertical position of the HUD by tapping and dragging. /n/n Not available for centered HUD. /n/n Not supported by all versions of iOSSupports dragging in landscape mode.
